name: Jonathan Montalvo
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello, my name is Jonathan Montalvo. I'm Currently seeking part time employment, either on the weekends or evenings. I currently work as a supervisor at a warehouse but need more work to make ends meet. I work hard and I am always committed to my employers.
experience:
• Warehouse Supervisor at Eyelevel Aug. 2017 to present - I manage staff and make sure we meet our project deadlines.
  • Sales Rep at Fit4sale 2014-2015 - Preformed sales on the floor and over the phone
additionalInfo: I've grown Marijuana, trimmed and am very knowledgeable of strains. Though I have no professional experience, I'm a fast learner and have great interpersonal skills.
